preferences.name: maxInactivityTime
preferences.title: Minimum inactivity time (minutes)
preferences.description: Dustman closes only those tabs which haven't been active for specified period of time.

preferences.name: minTabsCount
preferences.title: Minimum number of tabs per window
preferences.description: When window has less tabs than this value, Dustman will not close them. Pinned and unseen tabs (if enabled) are not counted in this limit.

preferences.name: maxHistorySize
preferences.title: Number of closed tabs showed in panel

preferences.name: lockUnseenTabs
preferences.title: Don't close tabs which were not viewed yet
